title: Quản lý Bảo hiểm xã hội 2
overview: Social Insurance Management 2 is a required course for students majoring in this field. It provides theoretical knowledge, modern, systematic, and relevant to Vietnamese law on state management in the field of social insurance as well as management of social insurance activities. The course covers in-depth knowledge related to basic content such as social insurance management, social insurance fund investment activities, management tools, inspection and supervision of social insurance activities, and state management of social insurance.

sub_domains: Inspection and Supervision of Social Insurance Activities

skill_outcomes.skill_name: Understanding and applying basic concepts of social insurance management
skill_outcomes.outcome_description: Students will be able to understand and apply basic concepts of social insurance management such as financial management, social insurance inspection, and supervision.

skill_outcomes.skill_name: Using knowledge of social insurance management principles
skill_outcomes.outcome_description: Students will be able to use knowledge of social insurance management principles to formulate policies and strategies for the development and organization of social insurance agencies.
Students will have research and independent work skills, as well as the ability to organize and manage resources for professional social insurance management activities.

Students will be able to plan, coordinate, and manage resources, evaluate and improve the effectiveness of activities, and organize, evaluate, supervise, and inspire members in assigned tasks and social activities.

prerequisite_courses: Quản lý Bảo hiểm xã hội 1
